name: White Broast Recipe | Masala TV
ingredients: Ingredients for White Broast Recipe: Chicken (breast pieces) 4 Vinegar 1 cup Black Pepper 2 tsp White Chilli 1tsp Eggs 2 Rice Flour 1 cup Soda Water as required Oil as required
instructions: In a chicken add salt, black pepper, vinegar and put in fridge and leave it over night. Then in a vinegar add chicken and take it out. Now in a bowl add rice flour, black pepper, white chillies, remaining salt, eggs and beat it. After this, add soda water and make paste. Now chicken pieces dip in mixture and fry.
